summary: A utility class that supports automated testing of TensorFlow implementations of OpenAI GPT models by generating configurations, synthetic inputs, and verifying the behavior of various model components such as language modeling, sequence classification, and dual-head architectures.
business_intent: Provide developers and researchers with a reliable testing framework to validate the correctness, performance, and integration of TensorFlow-based OpenAI GPT models, reducing bugs and accelerating model development cycles.
